mapper.select: SELECT nb.note_id, nb.note_name, nb.update_date, wo.create_user_id FROM notebook nb INNER JOIN workspace_object wo ON nb.note_id = wo.wrkspc_obj_id AND wo.obj_status != 'DROPPED' INNER JOIN workspace_assign wa ON nb.note_id = wa.wrkspc_obj_id AND wa.wrkspc_id = #{wrkspcId} ORDER BY nb.update_date DESC

SELECT nb.note_id, nb.note_name, nb.update_date, wo.create_user_id, wa.wrkspc_id FROM notebook nb INNER JOIN workspace_object wo ON nb.note_id = wo.wrkspc_obj_id AND wo.obj_status != 'DROPPED' INNER JOIN workspace_assign wa ON nb.note_id = wa.wrkspc_obj_id INNER JOIN workspace_share ws ON ws.wrkspc_id = wa.wrkspc_id AND ws.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY update_date DESC
